title: Traverse City Record-Eagle: Natural Health Practitioner Offers Variety of Treatments - National University of Natural Medicine
author: Marilynn Considine
description: Abigail Ellsworth, ND, MSOM ('15), opened Sleeping Bear Natural Health last fall to offer a different type of medicine.
cleaned_text: her practice at Sleeping Bear Natural Health clinic in Traverse City, Michigan: "](https://career-alumni.nunm.edu/files/2016/03/Abigail-Ellsworth.jpg) [Natural health practitioner offers variety of treatments.](http://www.record-eagle.com/news/the_biz/natural-health-practitioner-offers-variety-of-treatments/article_bb4fac00-489d-5287-a58c-88b010abe861.html)" Dr. Ellsworth opened Sleeping Bear Natural Health last fall to offer a different type of medicine. The practice combines naturopathic therapies—like herbal remedies or diet changes—with acupuncture, Chinese medicine and counseling.
